original_text: Jesus replied, ‘Those Pharisees are like plants that my Father God did not put in the ground. Like a farmer, he will completely pull all those plants out of the ground.
korean_text: 예수께서 대답하여 이르시되 심은 것마다 내 하늘 아버지께서 심으시지 않은 것은 뽑힐 것이니

sentences.original_text: that my Father God did not put in the ground
sentences.korean_translation: 내 아버지 하나님이 땅에 심지 않으신 것들

sentences.original_text: he will completely pull all those plants out
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그 모든 식물을 완전히 뽑아낼 것이다
